General.Name: Jinlongyu Group Co Ltd Class A
General.Description: Jinlongyu Group Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, sale, and service of wires and cables in China. It offers low smoke halogen free, low smoke halogen free flame retardant, fire resistant low smoke halogen, fire resistant, flame retardant, and aluminum alloy wires and cables, as well as waterproof, ant-proof, branch cables, etc. The company also provides XLPE insulated power cables. Jinlongyu Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

5.Name: Lan  Xia
5.Title: Deputy GM, Sec. of the Board & Director
